name: Not Every Man's Ocean
description:
**UPDATE** A bug was introduced in one of the last changes to the game before submission that makes progression difficult. You can play the game with that single bug patched here: https://bit.ly/NotEveryMansOcean64

Play as a deep sea vessel on a path to dive deeper into the sea, while defeating hordes of enemies that would try to stop you. Use parts from their ships to craft and transform yourself into the perfect ocean floor dweller, allowing an infinite addition of modules and numerous hand crafted worlds to explore.
